good form.feedback: good form - The shape of the vase clearly demonstrates craftsmanship.

poor taste.feedback: poor taste - Taste is in the eye of the designer as well as the viewer.

contrasting themes.feedback: contrasting themes - There is uniformity in the shape, but there is no depth to this media to imply that it is contrasting with other figures.

AI.feedback: AI - While a modification of prior work, this is still AI generative work.

shading.feedback: shading - While there is a light source and a shadow cast, shading is a term used for pencil based sketching.

original work.feedback: original work - this character is not based on any person, place, or existing trope

accessible.feedback: accessible - The color scheme while high contrast in some areas, loses form in others and has written text unrelated to the character.

edited.feedback: edited - The colors were edited after the photo was taken.

luminous.feedback: luminous - The colors pop out and are very bright.

animal.feedback: animal - There is an animal within the photo.

balanced.feedback: balanced - The colors are a bit over-bearing.

original.feedback: original - After editing, this photo can not be 100% original.

minimal.feedback: minimal - The work had a lot going into it.

enigmatic.feedback: enigmatic - This is not very puzzling or difficult to understand.

realistic.feedback: realistic - Not realistic as it was edited after.

immersive.feedback: immersive - This draws in all viewers.

intriguing.feedback: intriguing - This promotes curiosity and makes people want to know more.
